MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the CW12 postcode area of Somerford, Congleton, affecting properties in Black Firs Lane and surrounding streets. Our emergency response team has managed to restore power to a number of properties, and we are working to restore power for those customers still without power. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of the complexity of the repairs required and our team are now working to get the power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 11:30AM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 7:40AM 27th January 2021
